name: Hisoka Morow
motto: Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.

name: Killua Zoldyck
motto: Electricity doesn't hurt me. When I said it doesn't hurt me, it means I can bare it. None the less, I feel the pain. That's why I'm a bit annoyed...

name: Kurapika
motto: I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.

name: Shoto Todoroki
motto: If you wanna stop this, then stand up! Because I've just got one thing to say to you! Never forget who you want to become!

name: Saitama
motto: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, and a 10km run EVERY SINGLE DAY!!!
